author: jfernan2
body:
resolves https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/38820

#### PR description:

As suggested here:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/38820#issuecomment-1191656492

to keep in line with https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/34366

we set assertLegacySafe to false in DQMStore for the whole class
title: [DQM] Fix for DQMStore setting assertLegacySafe to false
